newsitem.title: USA: Graphix Zone CFO and CEO resign.
newsitem.headline: Graphix Zone CFO and CEO resign.

text.p: Graphix Zone said on Tuesday that its chief financial officer and chief executive officer are resigning.
Chief Financial Officer Frank Murnane joined the company two months ago and is resigning to attend to personal matters, Graphix Zone said.
Chief Executive Charles Cortright, a company co-founder and company president, is leaving but will remain as a consultant.
Graphix Zone said Norm Block, who joined the company in February as chief operating officer, has been appointed president and a member of the board.

Also leaving the company is co-founder and Executive Vice President Angela Aber. Graphix Zone said Aber will also serve as a consultant and that she and Cortright will "continue to actively spearhead strategic projects to continue the company's success."
The company could not be immediately reached for further information.
